00044 void EGS_VoxelizedShape::EGS_VoxelizedShapeFormat0(const char *fname,
00045                                                    const string &Name,EGS_ObjectFactory *f) {
00046     prob=0; xpos=0; ypos=0; zpos=0; map=0; nx=0; ny=0; nz=0; nxy=0; nreg=0; type=-1;
00047     const static char *func = "EGS_VoxelizedShape::EGS_VoxelizedShape";
00048     otype = "voxelized_shape";
00049     if( !fname ) return;
00050     ifstream data(fname,ios::binary);
00051     if( !data ) {
00052         egsWarning("%s: failed to open file %s\n",func,fname);
00053         return;
00054     }
00055     char endian, form;
00056     data.read(&endian,1); data.read(&form,1);
00057     if( data.fail() ) {
00058         egsWarning("%s: failed to read endianess and format from %s\n",func,fname);
00059         return;
00060     }
00061     if( form < 0 || form > 1 ) {
00062         egsWarning("%s: unknwon format %d found in file %s\n",func,(int)form,fname);
00063         return;
00064     }
00065     if( endian != egsGetEndian() ) {
00066         egsWarning("%s: data in %s from a machine with different endianess.\n"
00067                "  Byte swaping not implemented yet.\n",func,fname);
00068         return;
00069     }
00070     short snx, sny, snz;
00071     data.read((char *)&snx,sizeof(short));
00072     data.read((char *)&sny,sizeof(short));
00073     data.read((char *)&snz,sizeof(short));
00074     if( data.fail() ) {
00075         egsWarning("%s: failed to read number of voxels from %s\n",func,fname);
00076         return;
00077     }
00078     if( snx < 1 || snx > 10000 || sny < 1 || sny > 10000 || snz < 1 || snz > 10000 ) {
00079         egsWarning("%s: number of voxels seems strange: nx=%d, ny=%d, nz=%d\n",
00080                 func,snx,sny,snz);
00081         return;
00082     }
00083     nx = snx; ny = sny; nz = snz;
00084     nxy = nx*ny; nreg = nxy*nz;
00085     egsInformation("Distribution has %d x %d x %d voxels\n",nx,ny,nz);
00086     float *x = new float [nx+1], *y = new float [ny+1], *z = new float [nz+1];
00087     data.read((char *)x, (nx+1)*sizeof(float));
00088     data.read((char *)y, (ny+1)*sizeof(float));
00089     data.read((char *)z, (nz+1)*sizeof(float));
00090     if( data.fail() ) {
00091         egsWarning("%s: failed to read voxel boundaries\n",func);
00092         delete [] x; delete [] y; delete [] z; return;
00093     }
00094     int nmap; float *p;
00095     if( form == 0 ) {
00096         p = new float [nreg];
00097         egsInformation("Format 0, reading %d values\n",nreg);
00098         data.read((char *)p, nreg*sizeof(float));
00099         if( data.fail() ) {
00100             egsWarning("%s: failed to read probabilities\n",func);
00101             delete [] p; delete [] x; delete [] y; delete [] z; return;
00102         }
00103         nmap = nreg;
00104     }
00105     else {
00106         egsInformation("Format 1, reading data\n");
00107         data.read((char *)&nmap, sizeof(int));
00108         if( data.fail() || nmap < 1 ) {
00109             egsWarning("%s: failed to read nmap\n",func);
00110             delete [] x; delete [] y; delete [] z; return;
00111         }
00112         map = new int [nmap];
00113         p = new float [nmap];
00114         data.read((char *)map, nmap*sizeof(int));
00115         data.read((char *)p, nmap*sizeof(float));
00116         if( data.fail() ) {
00117             egsWarning("%s: failed to read probabilities and bin numbers\n",func);
00118             delete [] p; delete [] map; delete [] x; delete [] y; delete [] z; return;
00119         }
00120     }
00121     EGS_Float *p1 = new EGS_Float [nmap]; int j;
00122     for(j=0; j<nmap; ++j) p1[j] = p[j];
00123     delete [] p;
00124     egsInformation("Making alias table\n");
00125     prob = new EGS_SimpleAliasTable(nmap,p1);
00126     xpos = new EGS_Float [nx+1];
00127     ypos = new EGS_Float [ny+1];
00128     zpos = new EGS_Float [nz+1];
00129     for(j=0; j<=nx; ++j) xpos[j] = x[j];
00130     for(j=0; j<=ny; ++j) ypos[j] = y[j];
00131     for(j=0; j<=nz; ++j) zpos[j] = z[j];
00132     delete [] x; delete [] y; delete [] z;
00133     type = form;
00134     egsInformation("Done\n");
00135 }
00136 
00137 EGS_VoxelizedShape::EGS_VoxelizedShape(int file_format, const char *fname,
00138     const string &Name,EGS_ObjectFactory *f) : EGS_BaseShape(Name,f),
00139     prob(0), xpos(0), ypos(0), zpos(0), map(0), nx(0), ny(0), nz(0), nxy(0),
00140     nreg(0), type(-1) {
00141     const static char *func = "EGS_VoxelizedShape::EGS_VoxelizedShape";
00142     if (file_format == 0) { // binary file format -> call original constructor
00143         string s(fname);
00144         EGS_VoxelizedShapeFormat0(s.c_str());
00145         return;
00146     }
00147     if (file_format != 1) { // unknown file format
00148         egsWarning("%s: unknown file format = %d\n",func,file_format);
00149         return;
00150     }
00151     // interfile format -> continue
00152     otype = "voxelized_shape";
00153     if( !fname ) return;
00154     ifstream h_file(fname);
00155     if( !h_file ) {
00156         egsWarning("%s: failed to open file %s\n",func,fname);
00157         return;
00158     }
00159     string data_file("");
00160     int data_type = -1;
00161     int Nx, Ny, Nz;
00162     float scale_x=0.0, scale_y=0.0, scale_z=0.0;
00163     while(1) {
00164         string line, key, value; size_t pos;
00165         getline(h_file, line);
00166         if( h_file.eof() || h_file.fail() || !h_file.good() ) break;
00167         pos = line.find(":=");
00168         if( pos == string::npos ) continue;
00169         key = line.substr(0, int(pos));
00170         value = line.substr(int(pos)+2);
00171         while ((key[0] == '!') || (key[0] == ' ')) key.erase(0,1);
00172         while (key[key.length()-1] == ' ') key.erase(key.length()-1, 1);
00173         while (value[0] == ' ') value.erase(0,1);
00174         while (value[value.length()-1] == ' ') value.erase(value.length()-1, 1);
00175         if ( key ==  "matrix size [1]" ) { sscanf(value.c_str(), "%u", &Nx); }
00176         else if ( key ==  "matrix size [2]" ) { sscanf(value.c_str(), "%u", &Ny);  }
00177         else if ( ( key ==  "number of slices" ) || (key ==  "number of images") ) { sscanf(value.c_str(), "%u", &Nz); }
00178         else if ( key ==  "scaling factor (mm/pixel) [1]" ) { sscanf(value.c_str(), "%f", &scale_x); }
00179         else if ( key ==  "scaling factor (mm/pixel) [2]" ) { sscanf(value.c_str(), "%f", &scale_y); }
00180         else if ( key ==  "slice thickness (pixels)" ) { sscanf(value.c_str(), "%f", &scale_z); } // ????????????????
00181         else if ( key ==  "name of data file" ) { data_file = value; }
00182         else if ( key ==  "number format" ) {
00183             if( (value == "float") || (value == "FLOAT") ) data_type = 0;
00184             else if( (value == "unsigned integer") || (value == "UNSIGNED INTEGER") ) data_type = 1;
00185             else if( (value == "signed integer") || (value == "SIGNED INTEGER")) data_type = 2;
00186             else egsWarning("%s: unrecognised 'number format' type: %s \n",func,value.c_str());
00187         }
00188     }
00189     if( Nx < 1 || Ny < 1 || Nz < 1 || scale_x <= 0.0 || scale_y <= 0.0 || scale_z <= 0.0 || data_file == "" || data_type == -1) {
00190         egsWarning("%s: invalid interfile header information: "
00191                 "Nx=%d Ny=%d Nz=%d scale_x=%f scale_y=%f scale_z=%f "
00192                 "data_file='%s' number_format=%d\n",func,Nx,Ny,Nz,scale_x,scale_y,scale_z,data_file.c_str(),data_type);
00193         return;
00194     }
00195     nx = Nx; ny = Ny; nz = Nz;
00196     nxy = nx*ny; nreg = nxy*nz;
00197     egsInformation("Distribution has %d x %d x %d voxels\n",nx,ny,nz);
00198     float *x = new float [nx+1], *y = new float [ny+1], *z = new float [nz+1];
00199     scale_x /= 10.0; scale_y /= 10.0; scale_z /= 10.0; // convert to cm
00200     {
00201         int j;
00202         for(j=0; j<=nx; j++) x[j] = -(float)nx*scale_x/2.0 + j*scale_x;
00203         for(j=0; j<=ny; j++) y[j] = -(float)ny*scale_y/2.0 + j*scale_y;
00204         for(j=0; j<=nz; j++) z[j] = -(float)nz*scale_z/2.0 + j*scale_z;
00205     }
00206     ifstream i_file(data_file.c_str(),ios::binary);
00207     if( !i_file ) {
00208         egsWarning("%s: failed to open interfile data "
00209                 "%s\n",func,data_file.c_str()); return;
00210     }
00211     int nmap = nreg;
00212     float *p = new float [nreg];
00213     if (data_type == 0) {
00214         i_file.read((char *)p, nreg*sizeof(float));
00215     } else if (data_type == 1) {
00216         unsigned short int *p_tmp = new unsigned short int [nreg];
00217         i_file.read((char *)p_tmp, nreg*sizeof(unsigned short int));
00218         for (int cc = 0; cc<nreg; cc++) p[cc] = (float) (p_tmp[cc]);
00219         delete [] p_tmp;
00220     } else {
00221         short int *p_tmp = new short int [nreg];
00222         i_file.read((char *)p_tmp, nreg*sizeof(short int));
00223         for (int cc = 0; cc<nreg; cc++) p[cc] = (float) (p_tmp[cc]);
00224         delete [] p_tmp;
00225     }
00226     EGS_Float *p1 = new EGS_Float [nmap]; int j;
00227     for(j=0; j<nmap; ++j) p1[j] = p[j];
00228     delete [] p;
00229     egsInformation("Making alias table\n");
00230     prob = new EGS_SimpleAliasTable(nmap,p1);
00231     xpos = new EGS_Float [nx+1];
00232     ypos = new EGS_Float [ny+1];
00233     zpos = new EGS_Float [nz+1];
00234     for(j=0; j<=nx; ++j) xpos[j] = x[j];
00235     for(j=0; j<=ny; ++j) ypos[j] = y[j];
00236     for(j=0; j<=nz; ++j) { zpos[j] = z[j]; egsInformation("%f ", zpos[j]); }
00237     delete [] x; delete [] y; delete [] z;
00238     type = 0;
00239     egsInformation("Done\n");
00240 }
00241 
00242 EGS_VoxelizedShape::~EGS_VoxelizedShape() {
00243     if( isValid() ) {
00244         delete prob;
00245         delete [] xpos; delete [] ypos; delete [] zpos;
00246         if( type == 1 ) delete [] map;
00247     }
00248 }

00251 extern "C" {
00252 
00253 EGS_VOXELIZED_SHAPE_EXPORT EGS_BaseShape* createShape(EGS_Input *input,
00254         EGS_ObjectFactory *f) {
00255     static const char *func = "createShape(voxelized shape)";
00256     if( !input ) {
00257         egsWarning("%s: null input?\n",func); return 0;
00258     }
00259     string fname; int err = input->getInput("file name",fname);
00260     int file_format; int err2 = input->getInput("file format",file_format);
00261     if( err ) {
00262         egsWarning("%s: missing 'file name' input\n",func); return 0;
00263     }
00264     if( err2 ) {
00265         egsInformation("%s: 'file format' input missing. Using default 'binary'"
00266                     "file format \n",func);
00267         file_format = 0;
00268     }
00269     EGS_VoxelizedShape *shape = new EGS_VoxelizedShape(file_format, fname.c_str());
00270     if( !shape->isValid() ) {
00271         delete shape; return 0;
00272     }
00273     shape->setName(input); shape->setTransformation(input);
00274     return shape;
00275 }
